segments.text: What are your hobbies , Mr . Green ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But it's an expensive hobby , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you're right . What do you like to do in your spare time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I usually play chess with my friends . But I like playing basketball best .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm not very good at it . I play just for the fun of it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Shall we have a game together some day ?
segments.speaker: S2
